subject: Dear Mary
body:
Dear Mary

Thanks for your responses,  In the first place,exchange of personal
identity is highly Needed.Would you be so kind as to send me your ID,and
information about yourself. Basically  all I need from you is
authenticity,integrity, protection, accountability and honesty which would
bring trust in humanity's work.

As you already know, nothing can undermine a business relationship more
completely than lack of trust because trust is the essential precondition
upon which all real success depends on please note that any information you
send will be held strict confidence not disclose to any other person

Iam trusting this project in your hand. This is our life time saving please
i Need your honest corporation to carry on this project.My Lawyer will
secure change of ownership and Affidavit of claim in your Name as my Next
of kin this will enable the security company to release the fund and also
get the fund across to you as you request.You are also to use the Fund for
anything GOD work and charity

You are to send your Full Details YOUR FULL NAME ADDRESS PHONE NUMBERS AND
YOUR ID,let me know if you are in position to Assist,
Best Regard,
Jessica F. Jeffrey

subject: Re: Dear Mary
body:
Dear Jessica F. Jeffrey,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing this opportunity. I appreciate your trust in me and understand the importance of honesty and confidentiality in any business endeavor.

Before we proceed further, I would like to know more about the details of this project. Could you please provide me with some additional information? Specifically, I would like to understand the nature of the project, how it aligns with charity work, and what my role would be in helping you.

Additionally, it would be helpful if you could clarify the specific steps involved in securing the change of ownership and obtaining the Affidavit of claim. This will help me better understand the process and ensure that everything is done legally and ethically.

Once I have a clearer understanding of these aspects, I will be able to assess whether I am in a position to assist you. Please let me know at your earliest convenience.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: Dear Mary
body:
Dear Mary

The content of your mail was understood and Noted,All i need from you is to
be full in charge of this project

1 on less privileged people
2 Assisting projects in the house of the LORD
3 Capaning for JESUS..

Bear in mind that I am very sick. Send your information this will enable me
to connect you with the Lawyer who will secure all the legal Documents.
Best Regard,
Jessica F. Jeffrey

subject: Re: Dear Mary
body:
Dear Jessica,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about the project you mentioned that focuses on assisting less privileged people in the house of the LORD. Could you please provide me with some additional details about how this project works and what kind of assistance is provided?

Also, you mentioned connecting me with a lawyer who will secure all the legal documents. Could you explain why legal documents are needed for this project? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of the process.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: Dear Mary
body:
Dear Mary

The Lawyer will obtain requisite legal documents  from court like Change of
ownership also Affidavit of claim in your Name as my Next of kin,Which will
Autorisa the security company to release the fund to you as my Next of kin
,Take care of the less privileged ones help the Needy also in the house of
the Lord.
Best Regard,
Jessica F. Jeffrey

subject: Re: Dear Mary
body:
Dear Jessica,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're doing well. I'm a bit confused about the information you shared. Could you please provide more details about the situation? What fund are you referring to, and how did my name come up as your next of kin?

I appreciate your willingness to help the less privileged and support charitable causes. It's always important to lend a helping hand when we can. However, before proceeding further, I would like to understand the background of this matter.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: Dear Mary
body:
Dear Mary

This fund is Deposited in a security company,And I am very sick the only
person that the security company can release this fund to is my Next of
kin,That is why the Lawyer will obtain Documents from court in your Name
to change your name as my Next of kin this will enable the security company
to release the fund to you.
Best Regard,
Jessica F. Jeffrey

subject: Re: Dear Mary
body:
Dear Jessica,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're doing well. I'm a bit confused about the information you shared regarding the fund being deposited in security. Could you please provide more details about what exactly this fund is and why it needs to be released by the security company?

Also, you mentioned that the lawyer will obtain documents from court in my name to change my name as your next of kin. I'm curious to know why this is necessary and how it relates to the release of the fund.

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: Dear Mary
body:
Dear Mary

Send your Details lets switch into action,This transaction is 100% riscky
free,My Lawyer will contact  you as the Doctor here don't always allow me
to use computer this is because of my health issues
Best Regard,
Jessica F. Jeffrey

subject: Re: Dear Mary
body:
Hello Jessica,

Thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about the opportunity you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some more details? What exactly is involved, and how can I proceed further?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: Dear Mary
body:
Dear Mary

There is nothing involve all you need is to send the following

1 YOUR FULL NAME

2 YOUR ADDRESS

3 YOUR PHONE NUMBERS.

4 YOUR VALID ID

This will enable the Lawyer to proceed.
Best Regard,
Jessica F. Jeffrey

subject: Re: Dear Mary
body:
Hello Jessica,

Thank you for reaching out. Could you please provide more information about why the lawyer needs this information? I want to make sure everything is clear before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: Dear Mary
body:
Dear Mary

Lawyers need this information to proceed to the security company. This will
enable them to transfer the fund to you as my Next of kin,Why all this
please am very sick,t don,t power for all this ,The best is to link you to
the Lawyer.
Best Regard,
Jessica F. Jeffrey

subject: Re: Dear Mary
body:
Hello Mary, thank you for sharing this information with me. Could you please provide more details about the process and how I can get in touch with the lawyer?

Best wishes,
Mary
